articles.author: María Luisa Paúl
articles.title: Record shows Indiana doctor fulfilled duty to report 10-year-old’s abortion
articles.description: Records show the doctor, Caitlin Bernard, reported the 10-year-old's abortion as required by law, despite criticism from Indiana Attorney General Todd Rokita.
articles.content:

articles.title: U.S. Secret Service deleted texts sought in Jan. 6 probe, watchdog says
articles.description: The U.S. Secret Service deleted text messages from Jan. 5 and Jan. 6, 2021 after they were requested by oversight officials investigating the agency's response to the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol, the agency watchdog has claimed.

articles.title: Biden heads to Saudi Arabia as White House braces for his meeting with Mohammed bin Salman
articles.description: White House officials are bracing for President Joe Biden's visit with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman as he heads to Saudi Arabia on Friday, fully aware that the optics are not in their favor.

articles.title: Manchin says he won't support climate, tax provisions in sweeping Democratic bill
articles.description: Sen. Joe Manchin said he will not support the climate or tax provisions of a Democratic economic package he had been negotiating with Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer for months.

articles.title: Uvalde shooting leaked video: Officer seen on phone is reportedly Ruben Ruiz, husband of teacher who died, Eva Mireles
articles.description: A lawmaker confirmed that Officer Ruben Ruiz, seen in leaked video using his phone, is the husband of Eva Mireles, who died in the Uvalde shooting.
